LanguageData.FT_Sandbag.label: Military Sandbag
LanguageData.FT_Sandbag.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as cover. they are well-stacked so it is more durable.

LanguageData.FT_WallSandbag.label: Military sandbag wall

LanguageData.FT_WallSandbag_Frame.label: Military sandbag wall (building)
LanguageData.FT_WallSandbag_Frame.description: Bags of locally-sourced dirt or sand, stacked for use as wall. they are well-stacked so it is more durable.
